Regulation Name(s): Gastrointestinal Microorganism Multiplex Nucleic Acid-Based Assay
Specimen Container(s): Plastic container with lid prefilled 15 ml of media
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Automated sample preparation and nucleic acid extraction
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD MAX Enteric Parasite Panel using automated real-time PCR for qualitative detection of Giardia lamblia, Cryptosporidium hominis/parvum, and Entamoeba histolytica from stool and FecalSwab specimens
Indications for Use Summary: Aids in differential diagnosis of gastrointestinal infection by direct qualitative detection of enteric parasitic pathogens (Giardia lamblia, Cryptosporidium hominis/parvum, Entamoeba histolytica) from stool and FecalSwab specimens using real-time PCR on the BD MAX System, in conjunction with clinical evaluation
